data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Grichanov, Igor Ya., Kazerani, Farzaneh (2014): A new species of Sybistroma Meigen (Diptera: Dolichopodidae) from the Middle East with a key to West-Palaearctic species of the genus. Zootaxa 3866 (4): 572-582, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3866.4.7
